description:
When doing a nova list occasionally Parent instance <VirtualInterface at 0x3387390> is not bound to a Session; lazy load operation of attribute 'instance' cannot proceed (HTTP 500)

Running rev 1416.
title: Parent instance is not bound to a Session; lazy load operation of attribute 'instance' cannot proceed
